commentBody:
Devastating.

I don't know what's worse: (1) suffering each week with the Giants (I'm a Giants fan) blowing the lead with poor clock management and decision-making, knowing they're going to miss the playoffs as the season progresses, or (2) the Jets having a good season, controlling their destiny and then blowing it in one swoop - and against Rex Ryan.

I feel for the Jets.

No football joy in the Meadowlands this season.

I don't
